border_thickness }}px; border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; } .swiper-{{ section.id }} { --swiper-pagination-bullet-inactive-color: #D9D9D9; --swiper-pagination-bullet-inactive-opacity: 1; --swiper-pagination-bullet-horizontal-gap: 0; --swiper-pagination-bottom: 40px; font-family: var(--font-family); height: var(--mobile-height); } .swiper-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide { position: relative; height: auto; } .swiper-{{ section.id }} img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } div.swiper-button-next-{{ section.id }}, div.swiper-button-prev-{{ section.id }} { display: block; } main div.swiper-pagination-{{ section.id }} { width: fit-content !important; border-radius: 16px; left: 50% !important; transform: translateX(-50%); background: var(--swiper-pagination-bg-color); padding: 11px 20px; display: flex; gap: 25px; } .overlay-{{ section.id }} { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, var(--overlay-opacity)); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; display: block !important; } .text-content-{{ section.id }} { position: absolute; top: 45%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); color: var(--text-color); text-align: center; width: 87%; line-height: 1.4; } .banner-desktop-only { display: none; } .button-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ button_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 27px; } .tab-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 12px; display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 20px; position: absolute; bottom: 5%; width: 100%; z-index: 1; } .tab-button-{{ section.id }} { cursor: pointer; position: relative; padding-bottom: 15px; min-width: 50px; text-align: center; } .tab-button-bottom-{{ section.id }} { position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 3px; background-color: var(--swiper-pagination-bg-color); display: block !important; } .tab-button-bottom-overlay-{{ section.id }} { position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 0%; height: 3px; background-color: var(--swiper-pagination-bg-color-active-overlay); display: block !important; } .swiper-slide-image-{{ section.id }}, .swiper-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg { height: 100%; width: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .heading-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }}; } .heading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ heading_color }}; line-height: {{ heading_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .text-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }}; } .text-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ text_color }}; line-height: {{ text_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .first-btn-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; max-width: fit-content; margin: 0; font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ button_color }}; line-height: {{ button_height }}%; text-align: center; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px; border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }}; background-color: {{ button_bg_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; position: relative; font-weight: 700; z-index: 2; } .first-btn-{{ section.id }}:hover { color: {{ button_hover_color }}; border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }}; background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .second-btn-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; max-width: fit-content; margin: 0; font-size: {{ second_button_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ second_button_color }}; line-height: {{ second_button_height }}%; text-align: center; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; padding: {{ second_button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ second_button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; border-radius: {{ second_button_radius }}px; border: {{ second_button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ second_button_border_color }}; background-color: {{ second_button_bg_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; position: relative; font-weight: 700; z-index: 2; } .second-btn-{{ section.id }}:hover { color: {{ second_button_hover_color }}; border: {{ second_button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ second_button_border_hover_color }}; background-color: {{ second_button_bg_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .tab-button-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0; font-size: {{ tab_text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ tab_text_color }}; line-height: {{ tab_text_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } @media(min-width: 750px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .swiper-{{ section.id }} { height: var(--desktop-height); } .banner-mobile-only { display: none; } .banner-desktop-only { display: block; } .tab-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 14px; min-width: 110px; } .text-content-{{ section.id }} { top: 50%; } .heading-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ heading_align }}; } .heading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ heading_size }}px; } .text-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px; text-align: {{ text_align }}; } .text-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ text_size }}px; } .button-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px; } .first-btn-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px; font-size: {{ button_size }}px; } .second-btn-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ second_button_padding_vertical }}px {{ second_button_padding_horizontal }}px; font-size: {{ second_button_size }}px; } .tab-button-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ tab_text_size }}px; } } @media screen and (max-width: 749.5px) { div.swiper-button-next-{{ section.id }}, div.swiper-button-prev-{{ section.id }} { bottom: 36px; top: unset; } } {%- endstyle -%} {% unless full_width %} height.label: Section height in px
height.description: If not set, the height will be calculated automatically based on the content

overlay.label: Overlay
overlay.description: Will be applied to all slides. You can override this value for each slide.

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
